title: zakservers

content: Hi,Â We are glad to announce that, now Zak Servers is accepting SEPA/Wire Transfer as a payment method, currently you can only pay in EUR currency to our bank account from anywhere around the globe or with SEPA/SEPA instant within EU.We are already accepting BTC as a payment method.For further details of this announcement kindly visit our website or contact with sales: https://www.zakservers.com/
